text: The twenty-second World Masters Athletics Championships were held in Perth Australia, from October 26–November 6, 2016. This was the first even year of the biennial championship as beginning in 2016, the championships moved to be held in even numbered years. The World Masters Athletics Championships serve the division of the sport of athletics for people over 35 years of age, referred to as Masters athletics. A full range of track and field events were held, along with a cross country race and a marathon. ==Results== ===100 metres=== ====M35 100 metres==== Wind: +2.5 {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;
